reviewText: The book make me cry and the movie too. You should see it.

Absolutely LOVE this movie! i read the book long time ago and it's really nice to have it as a movie. So glad I found it in Spanish. Make sure you read the description because it's for region 1 and 4 so it might not play in some dvd players. It's family friendly, my 5 year old loves it and so does my husband who had never read the book. It's one of those movies that you want to have in your collection for a life time, those movies that you can keep watching time and time again and never get bored of it and always finding a new meaning. Highly recommended .
Nice to get a couple more episodes.
